content: lion brand pattern # 20303 *chsb-victoryblanket pdf modified april 01 2004* skill level easy level 2 homespun® baby article #800 *discontinued* 465 yards *same weight in terms of thickness as regular homespun but skeins are half the size of regular homespun skeins * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitch v_stitch work in pattern for 34 row without breaking yarn crochet picot edging to finish
